body:
Hola,

So I created the new account for Gravatar, and I used the email on Avicus (yes, it's verified) for the Gravatar account. However nothing seems to be updating on the Avicus website, and I'm not sure how to do it. Anyone able to fill me in?

Regards, -Jake

title: Profile Picture

replies.body: What was the rating you gave your avatar?
replies.body_tagged: What was the rating you gave your avatar?

replies.body: Is there a specific rating I was supposed to put on it? I wasn't sure what the "rating" was used for, so I just used PG.
replies.body_tagged: Is there a specific rating I was supposed to put on it? I wasn't sure what the "rating" was used for, so I just used PG.

replies.body: Did you set a picture to your gravatar?
replies.body_tagged: Did you set a picture to your gravatar?

replies.body: I'm pretty sure, I uploaded the picture to it, but it's unclear to me how to actually "set" it.
replies.body_tagged: I'm pretty sure, I uploaded the picture to it, but it's unclear to me how to actually "set" it.

replies.body: Ah, there we go. Got it to work, this thread can be locked now if you please.
